mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SSACK_TBL ( EMAIL , NICKNAME , PASSWORD , PHONE , IS_JANDI , WARNING , IS_BLACK , ENROLL_DATE , IS_EXIT , NAME ) VALUES ( #{ email } , #{ nickName } , #{ password } , #{ phone } , DEFAULT , DEFAULT , DEFAULT , SYSDATE , DEFAULT , #{ name } )
mapper.select: SELECT A.PASSWORD FROM SSACK_TBL A WHERE A.EMAIL = #{ email } AND IS_EXIT = 'N'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SSACK_TBL A WHERE A.EMAIL = #{ email } AND IS_EXIT = 'N'

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO EMAIL_CHECK_TBL ( CHECK_CODE , EMAIL , CHECK_NUMBER ) VALUES ( SEQ_MAIL_CHECK_TBL.NEXTVAL , NULL , #{ value } )
